item.title: Recipe of Ultimate Healthy lunch Lentil with rice called Koshri and Chicken, salad
item.description: Hello everybody, it’s me again, Dan, welcome to my recipe site. Today, I’m gonna show you how to prepare a distinctive dish, healthy lunch lentil with rice called koshri and chicken, salad.
